section.name: Bob's web-store example.
section.h4: Bob's pizza web-store example. Part 1, catalog.
section.p: Beigesoft™ web-store allows you to create extremely powerful and flexible catalog of goods/services. You can create dynamically (without programming) any good/service specifics (characteristic), e.g. "Color", "Size", "Car's body type", "Car's fuel type". And these specifics is ready to use in filter. Beigesoft™ web-store implements advanced, dynamic internationalization, so your catalog will be appeared in language that a buyer prefers.
Any catalog can consist of your goods and services as well as something else's ones (belongs to another seller)
* S.E. seller is available since 1.1.8 version (in source code right now). Internationalization of embed HTML in item's detail page is also available since 1.1.8 version.

Bob decided to use Beige-Webstore (it's included into Beige-Accounting) for selling his pizza. He also decided to start new business activity - allow others sellers to sell their used car on Bob's store. People trust Bob, so Bob will inspects other seller's cars to insure buyers that all information about goods is true. Other sellers will paid fee to Bob for his service after they have sold their cars.
